bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Radio Interface for White Space Dynamic Spectrum Access Radio Systems SupportingFixed and Mobile Operation
IEEE Standard for Radio Interface for White Space Dynamic Spectrum Access Radio Systems SupportingFixed and Mobile Operation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A radio interface including medium access control sublayer and physical layer of white space dynamic spectrum access radio systems supporting fixed and mobile operation in white space frequency bands, while avoiding causing harmful interference to incumbent users in these frequency bands is specified in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
